code-runner.executorMap.java: cd '$workspaceRoot' && javac -cp src:lib lib/*.java src/$fileName -d bin -encoding ISO-8859-1 && java -cp '$workspaceRoot/bin' $fileNameWithoutExt
cd '$workspaceRoot' && javac -cp src:lib lib/*.java src/*.java -d bin -encoding ISO-8859-1 && jar cfmv build/run.jar META-INF/MANIFEST.MF -C bin . && java -cp '$workspaceRoot/bin' src.run
